docs.snippet: Former professional basketball star Dennis Rodman pleaded guilty and was sentenced to three years' informal probation on Monday on charges that he drove the wrong way on a California highway, forcing another car to swerve into a concrete dividing ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Former professional basketball star Dennis Rodman pleaded guilty and was sentenced to three years' informal probation on Monday on charges that he drove the wrong way on a California highway, forcing another car to swerve into a concrete dividing wall.

headline.main: Ex-NBA Star Rodman Gets Three Years Probation on Driving Charges
headline.print_headline: Ex-NBA Star Rodman Gets Three Years Probation on Driving Charges
